allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive site selection criteria for storage facility development

- Stage 0: Highway expansion & manufacturing reshoring pre-filter (Trump-era focus)
- Stage 1-6: Waterfall elimination process with hard eliminators through financial modeling
- Stage 7: Advanced criteria & refinements (economic diversity, RV/boat proximity, etc.)
- Construction comparison: 10x10 shipping containers vs metal buildings
- Financial model: $514,500/acre investment, 21.4% ROI, 4.7-year payback
- Financing: 25-year mortgage at 6% with 2.18 debt coverage ratio
- Phased development: Build in thirds (40 units/phase) triggered by 80% occupancy
- RV/boat storage: Monetize undeveloped space during phases (zero investment)
- 2-acre strategy: Near lakes/campgrounds - permit 240 units, build 120, use acre 2 for RV/boat
- Property search: Integration plan for Perplexity/Abacus.ai for scraping MLS/FSBO listings
- Target: Rural/suburban 1-acre parcels, 120 units per acre capacity
- Regulatory: Permitting determines construction method (containers vs metal buildings)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Neon PostgreSQL backend with 9-stage screening pipeline

- Add zone_service.py for dynamic zone creation from any ZIP code
- Add pipeline_service.py with 9-stage screening (S0-S8)
- Add data_fetcher_service.py with throttled API fetching
- Add google_service.py for storage facility search via Google Places
- Add zones.py API endpoints for zone management
- Create Neon schema with 41,551 ZIP codes loaded
- Implement cache-based throttling (7-30 day TTLs per data type)
- Add Census, FEMA, USGS water bodies, and Google Places integration
- Include test scripts and documentation

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
